message:
SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 43
•  Can be used for some ontological inference (well 
known since [Perez et al. 2008]  
•  E.g. Find all Beers in the Beer ontology 
PREFIX beer: <http://www.purl.org/net/ontology/beer#> 
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
SELECT ?beer 
FROM <http://www.purl.org/net/ontology/beer> 
WHERE { 
   ?beer rdf:type/rdfs:subClassOf* beer:Beer . 
} 
51 
Ontological Engineering Group 
Path expressions
speaker: SYSTEM
